name: Abak Software
overview:
Abak Software makes systems to help organizations track time sheets, expenses reports and invoices. Abak, the companyâ€™s time and billing, workflow and project cost management solution is sold all over the world.

The software is widely used and renowned in the service industry, with a large customer base in accounting, engineering, software engineering, architecture, research consultants, business consultants and multimedia. We use Crystal Reports to customize your reports and simplify your management. We also offer training to make sure you are well-prepared to make the most of Abak.

Abak is the bridge between your team working on projects, and business management systems such as accounting and payroll:

Employees and vendors fill out their time sheet and expense reports. Managers approve their teamâ€™s time and expenses. Project Managers produce reports in project status, such as work in progress, budget control and project profitability. Accounting professionals invoice clients for the billable work done, and transfer the data to accounting and payroll.
